content.raw:
Currently, "time" for the user just shows up as one plottable variable. When they drag it, we can internally combine `sec` and `nsec`. We should think about how we're going to display the time axis too. I briefly discussed this with @spaepcke , but I don't think we came up to any conclusion. I have a feeling we will end up formatting it in a similar way to the logging playback and the bottom toolbar.

As for quaternion, I'll change the user's options to euler.
content.html:
Currently, "time" for the user just shows up as one plottable variable. When they drag it, we can internally combine sec and nsec. We should think about how we're going to display the time axis too. I briefly discussed this with @spaepcke , but I don't think we came up to any conclusion. I have a feeling we will end up formatting it in a similar way to the logging playback and the bottom toolbar.

As for quaternion, I'll change the user's options to euler.
